text: This Side of Paradise is the first novel of F. Scott Fitzgerald, and was first sold in 1920. ==Plot Summary== Amory Blaine leaves his mother and friend behind to go to a good American university. At university he falls in love with a girl called Isabelle, but she is not interested in Amory. Amory then goes to fight in the First World War. When he returns from the war, he falls in love with Rosalind. Because Amory is poor, Rosalind is not interested in him and decides to marry someone else. Amory then learns that his friend from home has died. == References == * * ==Other websites== * * This Side of Paradise * alternate. New York: Charles Scribner's Sons, 1922. Scanned book from Internet Archive. * This Side of Paradise Map Category:20th-century American novels Category:1920 books Category:Books by F. Scott Fitzgerald
title: This Side of Paradise
